data.title: ehtplot: Plotting functions for the Event Horizon Telescope
data.name: ehtplot
data.description: Plotting functions for the Event Horizon Telescope

evidence: "`ehtplot` is a python module that assists scientists in the Event Horizon Telescope (EHT) Collaboration to create publication quality, elegant, and consistent plots. It provides a set of easy-to-use plotting functions..." (indicates a reusable Python module/library)

"It is straightforward to enable `ehtplot`'s theme even without using `ehtplot` for plotting. One simply loads the theme submodule: `import ehtplot.theme`" (shows it is imported as a dependency in other code)
README only references the GitHub repository and documentation links, with no mention of PyPI, conda, or other package managers, implying distribution via the source repository.
